name: ground-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Ground form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Ground.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Ground form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Ground.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A memory disc that contains Ground-type data.
It changes the type of the holder if held by
a certain species of Pokémon.
